Ground modifiers: 120% vs. Defensive Structure, Tank Bunkers and Lightning Rods
60% vs. Plate/Cyborg and Very Big Defensive Structure
10% vs. Big Light Structure and Big Heavy Structure
Air modifiers: 80% vs. Rocketeers, Norio, Gyrocopters, Cosmonauts and Uragan
Notes: Limited to one for each player
Build time is unaffected by multiple War Factories
Cannot be attacked byChrono LegionnairesandCharon Tanks
Cannot be mind-controlled, hijacked, depiloted, abducted andchronoshifted
Must be deployed to charge the support powersThe support powers have to be charged all over again if the Boidmachine is undeployed
The support powers have to be charged all over again if the Boidmachine is undeployed
